comments.body:
The only difference between branches is the name. Maybe try:

``` scala
val symName = if (isClass) name.asTypeName else name
ctx.newClassSymbol(ctx.owner, name.asTypeName, flags, completer, privateWithin, coord = start.index)

```
And whether create a symbol or a class symbol no? That prevented me from merging the branches.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +485,489 @@            val completer = adjustIfModule(new Completer(ctx.owner, subReader(start, end)))
            if (isClass)
              ctx.newClassSymbol(ctx.owner, name.asTypeName, flags, completer, privateWithin, coord = start.index)
            else
              ctx.newSymbol(ctx.owner, name, flags, completer, privateWithin, coord = start.index)
